name: PipeLine MotorSports Racing
description:
Pipe Line  Motor Sports Racing is on alpha v2.9 and is a racing game staring the Aster ex and soon the Verta ex . its only a dollar,  I plan to add few more features 

 Recommended specs:  (x64)

 Ryzen 3700x 8gb ram , RX 580    / Intel core i7 9700k 8gb ram RX 580

 Minimum Recommended specs: (x86-x64)

 FX 4130, 3gb ram,  HD 6970   / Intel core  i7 860, 3gb ram,  HD 6970

This game requires XD 11 support, and will run on windows 7 -11.

(available versions 2.8,2.9)
(deprecated versions 1.0,1.4,2.2,2.5,2.6,2.7)
